name: Space Monkeys (itch) (LewyT)
description:
An interstellar civilization of primates attempts to colonize a planet without realizing there is already a civilization there.

Space Monkeys is an action/strategy game where you need to survive on a new planet and defeat the monsters that already live there.

THIS GAME IS A WORK IN PROGRESS. Please leave your feedback: Suggestions, comments, criticisms, encouragement, etc.

Press Escape to pause or exit the intro screen.
Standard WASD movement with mouse-look.
[E] to interact with stuff.
[R] for inventory
[TAB] for map where you can see locations and characters and choose a spawn point
[LEFT CLICK] to use active item
[MOUSE SCROLL] to change active item

When you first spawn, buy a weapon, you will need it.
If you find an enemy base, you can stand close to it for a few seconds to capture it if there are no enemies nearby.
Watch your resources: Health, Energy, Material. There are ways to replenish them.
